pkgmetadata.longdescription: TikZpy package for drawing in TikZ==================================What Is This?-------------TikZpy simplifies the art of drawing by code tikz figures in eps, png and tikz LaTeX compatible figures using PythonHow To Use This---------------Install as,```python3 -m pip install tikzpy```More info in [tikzpy.readthedocs.io](https://tikzpy.readthedocs.io)Requires to install MikTex (miktex.org) or similar LaTeX distribution
